title: Boy's Basketball 63-53
excerpt: Varsity Boys Basketball fell 63-53 against Lynbrook High School on Saturday, Dec. 31.

title: Signing Santa
excerpt: The City of Cupertino hosted its annual Signing Santa event on Dec. 10 at the Quinlan Center.

title: Girls Soccer 7-0
excerpt: Varsity Girls Soccer defeated Capuchino High School 7-0 on Wednesday, Dec. 8.

title: Kickboxing
excerpt: MVHS hosted a finals prep event on Dec. 7 during lunch at the Rally Court.

title: Peter and the Starcatcher
excerpt: MV Drama, with support from Variations and Bella Voce, hosted the opening night for its fall musical “Peter and the Starcatcher” in the auditorium on Wednesday, Nov. 16.

title: Matadors in Focus: Kalani Poulter
excerpt: A spotlight on Kalani Poulter, a senior who enjoys trying new activities.

title: Matadors in Focus: Annika Polavarapu
excerpt: A spotlight on Annika Polavarapu, a senior who is in choir and plays piano.

title: Volunteer Fair
excerpt: The City of Cupertino hosted its volunteer fair for the first time in three years on Saturday, Oct. 1.

title: Volleyball 3-2
excerpt: Varsity Girls Volleyball defeated Cupertino High School 3-2 on Tuesday, Sept. 13.

title: Man on the Street: College Applications
excerpt: With the first of most early college application deadlines arriving, EE reporters Jiya Singh and Yash Thapliyal ask MVHS seniors about their thoughts on their essay and application process.

title: Pooch Plunge
excerpt: The City of Cupertino hosted the fifth annual Pooch Plunge at Blackberry Farm on Saturday, Sept. 10.

title: Water Polo 16-10 & 8-7
excerpt: Varsity Boys and Varsity Girls Water Polo defeated Saratoga High School 16-10 and 8-7 respectively on Tuesday, Sept. 6.

title: Welcome Back Rally
excerpt: MVHS held its Welcome Back Rally in the Gym on Friday, Sept. 2. Photo by Krish Dev.

title: FUHSD Watermelon Run
excerpt: MVFUHSD hosted its annual watermelon run at Fremont High School on campus for the first time since since 2018 on Wednesday, Aug. 31.

title: SF Pride Parade
excerpt: On Sunday, June 26, San Francisco’s annual pride parade returned after a two year hiatus due to the pandemic. Photo by Krish Dev.
